subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Instant Messaging
msgSnippet: Hi CJ How did you get Trillian to accept ThothUni?  I tried it in Adium (which is the Mac equivalent) and it doesn t seem to work.  I can get my handwriting
messageBody:
Hi CJ

How did you get Trillian to accept ThothUni?  I tried it in Adium (which is the Mac equivalent) and it doesn't seem to work.  I can get my handwriting font to display OK, but not Thoth.

Has anyone else had any experience of Thoth on Mac OS X?

Moira

Moira O'Brien Photography
Member SWPP/BPPA

www.moiraobrien.com  www.corkphotographer.net  www.photographers-united.com  www.corkcameragroup.net
www.moirajane.net

Tel +353 876-214532  eFax: +44 8701-337953

Mailto://mj@...
Messengers:
Yahoo: moira_ob  MSN: mj@... Skype: MoiraJane Googletalk Moirajaneob


2008/10/17 cj_carlisle <cj_carlisle@...>

Greetings, All!

I am interested in chatting over an Instant Messaging platform using
Quickscript. I have scoured the message board and cannot find any
reference to Instant Messaging throughout.

Is anyone else interested in this form of "Conversational Quickscript"?

If so, I am currently able to use Thoth Uni in my IM application. (I
use Trillian.) I am on both AIM's and Yahoo!'s services.

I am from the Southeastern US, so I have a bit of a drawl which may
show up in some of my Quickscript.

I look forward to chatting!

-CJ
